25#define __BITPIT_STENCIL_SOLVER_SRC__
26
27#include "stencil_solver.hpp"
28
29namespace bitpit {
30
31// Explicit instantization
32template class DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilScalar>;
33template class DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilVector>;
34template class DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilBlock>;
35
36template class DiscretizationStencilSolver<StencilScalar>;
37template class DiscretizationStencilSolver<StencilVector>;
38template class DiscretizationStencilSolver<StencilBlock>;
39
40// Template specializations
41
45template<>
46void DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilScalar>::setBlockSize()
47{
48 setBlockSize(1);
49}
50
58template<>
59double DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilScalar>::getRawValue(const StencilScalar::weight_type &element, int item) const
60{
61 BITPIT_UNUSED(item);
62
63 return element;
64}
65
69template<>
70void DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilVector>::setBlockSize()
71{
72 setBlockSize(sizeof(typename StencilVector::weight_type) / sizeof(typename StencilVector::weight_type::value_type));
73}
74
82template<>
83double DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilVector>::getRawValue(const StencilVector::weight_type &element, int item) const
84{
85 return element[item];
86}
87
100template<>
101void DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilBlock>::setBlockSize()
102{
103 // Get block size
104 //
105 // Block size is evaluated from the first weight.
106 //
107 // The block size is set equal to the square root of the weight size;
108 // if the square root of the weight type is not an integer number, an
109 // exception is throw.
110 m_blockSize = - 1;
111 for (long i = 0; i < getRowCount(); ++i) {
112 const StencilBlock &stencil = getRowStencil(i);
113 std::size_t stencilSize = stencil.size();
114 if (stencilSize == 0) {
115 break;
116 }
117
118 const StencilBlock::weight_type *weightData = stencil.weightData();
119 double blockSize = std::sqrt(weightData[0].size());
120 if (blockSize != std::sqrt(weightData[0].size())) {
121 throw std::runtime_error("Weights size should be a square.");
122 }
123 setBlockSize(static_cast<int>(blockSize));
124 break;
125 }
126
127 if (m_blockSize == -1) {
128 throw std::runtime_error("All weights should have a size greater than zero.");
129 }
130
131#ifdef DEBUG
132 // Validate block size
133 //
134 // All weight sizes should match
135 for (long i = 0; i < getRowCount(); ++i) {
136 const StencilBlock &stencil = getRowStencil(i);
137 const StencilBlock::weight_type *weightData = stencil.weightData();
138 std::size_t stencilSize = stencil.size();
139
140 for (std::size_t k = 0; k < stencilSize; ++k) {
141 if (weightData[k].size() != m_blockSize)) {
142 throw std::runtime_error("All stencils weights should have the same size.");
143 }
144 }
145
146 if (stencil.getConstant().size() != m_blockSize) {
147 throw std::runtime_error("The stencils constant should have the same size of the stencil weights.");
148 }
149 }
150#endif
151}
152
160template<>
161double DiscretizationStencilSolverAssembler<StencilBlock>::getRawValue(const StencilBlock::weight_type &element, int item) const
162{
163 return element[item];
164}
165
166}
